topics.body:
Oh hey Whatevs; I posted about it in the morning and such, but I guess you were at work.  Essentially there was a article by cnn about marriage.

You know that thing we were talking about marriage wise?  It turns out we were totally right about the changing demographics of marriage.

The article didn't go super super in depth demographics wise but younger generations are drastically lower less likely to marry and when they do marry they show a extreme personal bias in who they marry rather than marrying for the purpose of marrying.
